head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths MIELNICKI, MICHAEL I.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths MIELNICKI, MICHAEL I.

block.p: MIELNICKI-Michael I. Age 57, on July 15, 2000 in Tel Aviv. Beloved son of the late Hadassah and the late Abraham, loving father of Ariel and Rhony, devoted brother of Ruth (Jerrold) Levy and Daniel (Judith) Mielnicki of Boca Raton, FL., adored uncle of Judith, David and Cherilyn, and Ari Levy, and of Jenna & Andra Mielnicki. A loyal son of the Jewish state, a brilliant linguist & a passionate wordsmith. Michael, we pray that you have found peace. You will live in our hearts forever. Interment in Tel Aviv on Wednesday, July 19. Memorial service 3 PM Friday, July 21, at Temple Beth El, 333 S.W. 4th Avenue, Boca Raton, Florida.
